title: The slum dweller is duty bound to keep the premises of his rehab unit including common areas and surroundings of the rehab buildings clean, hygienic and untidy
clause_text: The slum dweller is duty bound to keep the premises of his rehab unit including common areas and surroundings of the rehab buildings clean, hygienic and untidy.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
